line.originaltext: 1 (8.5 ounce) package corn bread/muffin mix
1 egg
1/3 cup milk
2 pounds ground beef
1/2 cup chopped onion
1 (26 ounce) jar meatless spaghetti sauce
1 cup frozen corn
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
2 (1.3 ounce) envelopes sloppy joe mix
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
Prepare and bake corn bread according to package directions, using the egg and milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2}, ing10, "cornbread mix", "prepare corn bread according to package")

line.originaltext: Prepare and bake corn bread according to package directions, using the egg and milk.
Prepare and bake corn bread according to package directions, using the egg and milk.
line.annotation: cook(ing10, t0, ing11, "cornbread", "bake according to package")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t1, ing13, "cooked beef and onion", "cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Stir in the spaghetti sauce, corn, chilies and sloppy joe mix.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing16, "sloppy joe mix", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t1, ing17, "boiled joe mix", "bring to a boil")

line.originaltext: Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t1, ing18, "simmering joe mix", "reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing9}, ing19, "joe mix with cheese", "sprinkle with cheese")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "melted cheese joe mix", "cover and cook for 1 minute")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
Cut corn bread into six pieces; cut each piece in half.
Cut corn bread into six pieces; cut each piece in half.
line.annotation: cut(ing21, , ing22, "6 halved pieces corn bread", "cut each piece in half")

line.originaltext: Top with sloppy joe mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing22}, ing23, "corn bread sloppy joes", "top with sloppy joe mixture")
